title: Which champion do you hate now and why?
body:
Annie mid...oh GOD Annie mid.....

Deals too much burst for how tanky she can afford to build...

replies.body:
{{champion:7}} 

Cancerous champion, overloaded with mobility, CC and point-and-click burst, no-skill-to-play at it's rawest.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9pupVcyK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-04T07:27:50.118+0000)
>
> {{champion:7}} 
> 
> Cancerous champion, overloaded with mobility, CC and point-and-click burst, no-skill-to-play at it's rawest.

Fair enough...I do agree she has too much mobility in comparison to how much damage she deals...either tone one down or both down a little I would say

Nidalee.

Specifically, Nidalee jungle. No comments needed.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9pupVcyK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-04T06:55:27.286+0000)
>
> Nidalee.
> 
> Specifically, Nidalee jungle. No comments needed.

Yeah what's so bad/good about it? Apparently it's hella-strong but I haven't tried it OR seen one in game yet...

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9pupVcyK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-04T08:08:52.007+0000)
>
> Yeah what's so bad/good about it? Apparently it's hella-strong but I haven't tried it OR seen one in game yet...

Braindead champ that has burst, mobility, sustain, low cooldowns, steriods, gap closer, 3 extra abilities and a decent escape mechanism.

Her ganks are average, but she doesn't even need kills to be strong, one or two items and her spears will still chunk your AD carry, and she generally can throw them risk free.

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9pupVcyK,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-06T04:42:12.860+0000)
>
> Nidalee/zed/maokai/nasus/annie/urgot

Maokai?? How so?? I thought he would be quite low on the average 'annoying/hate-to-verse' tier...

All the others I can understand, so here I apologise, I am (going to be) a Nid player myself xDDD
Well i just hate him being in a game. Boring pleb champ.. Tanky as hell and can stand in a teamfight while sticking to ur adc

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9pupVcyK,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-03-06T07:43:48.780+0000)
>
> Well i just hate him being in a game. Boring pleb champ.. Tanky as hell and can stand in a teamfight while sticking to ur adc

Well fair enough. His ult is a little strong xDD
Makes me wanna play him more xDD
voli. don't care how strong he is, he can always and should always be worse.
Yi i hate yi, he just comes out of no where and instapops you then resets ult and gets penta no skill piece of crap and if you get a team who picks zero stuns/snares he will just win
{{champion:75}}  Because he needs no skill and he QQ everything. QQ this. QQ that. QQ everything. And I hate his slow.

%%%%ing Lissandra and lee sin, no skill champs that bring to much to the game.

and rek'sai is %%%%ing broken.
